translation: This is the royal science, the royal secret, the supreme purifier, realizable by direct intuitive knowledge, according to righteousness, very easy to perform and imperishable.
commentary: 9.2 Rajavidya the king of sciences? royal secret kingly secret? Holy purifier? This is this? The best highest? direct understanding realizable by direct? intuitive knowledge? righteousness according to righteousness? Susukham very easy? to do to perform? Avyayam imperishable.Commentary In this verse Lord Krishna eulogizes the knowledge of Brahman very highly in order to create a great interest in the spiritual
